page.title: 04Kinnoull Hill-a popular walk
page.content: Kinnoull Hill is a very popular climb with the people of Perth and visitors too.From the top you can see the whole of Perth and much of the surroundings on a good clear day.There are many ways to get to the top so there is always some new path to try.You may be lucky and see a red squirrel or even a deer in winter.However do not get to close to the edge at the top as there are very dangerous cliffs and a sheer drop to the bottom! There's a ruined watch tower at the top but when you realise that it was a folly built by someone who admired the castles above the Rhine,it doesn't make it so exciting! Kinnoull Hill is only 923m high so its not too far to the top and well worth the effort.
